thoughts.words: I have so many thoughts, maybe too many, and I never knew how to represent them. I can lay them down as words, I can captures them as pictures, I can express them through someone else's words as quotes, I can play them as music, I can combine pictures and sounds into a video and let it play.

There's so many possibilites and I'm not particulary good at any of them. But I am a programmer, a software engineer if I were to lay down my full title, as the modest man I am. What I know best is to express my ideas in code, I worked for years to improve my skills. So I decided to give it a try and combine every means of expression I am able to use into a single piece, held together by CODE.
I like to take pictures and I like even more to edit them and turn them into a most accurate expression of something I want to convey, even if that meaning is understood by no one but myself.
I like to listen to other people's thougths and analyze them, record them, and carefully integrate them into my own being.
Your unconcious bias against certain patterns gives me insight into the otherwise unlimited options you have.
thoughts.author: The Ant King
